attributes.action: prosecute those in the catholic church who covered up or failed to report child abuse.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There have been calls for those in the catholic hierarchy who knew about the child abuse to resign.

But if they covered it up, or failed to report it to the police, they committed a criminal offence. They should all be prosecuted.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
